_meanings:
{@--2@} Roaming or walking for pleasure,
airing, a stroll, taking a walk.

{@--3@} Sport, play, pastime, recreation,
diversion, pleasure; {#vihAraSElAnugateva#}
{#nAgEH#} <ls>R. 16. 26</ls>, <ls n="R. 16.">67</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 41</ls>; <ls n="R.">9. 68</ls>, 

<ls n="R.">13. 38</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 37</ls>.

{@--4@} Tread, 
stepping, movement (of hands, feet
&c.); {#vikarzaREH pARivihArahArimiH#}  
<ls>Ki. 4. 15</ls>; {#daramaMTaracaraRavihAraM#} <ls>GÄ«t. 11.</ls>

{@--5@} A park, garden; especially a
pleasure-garden.

{@--7@} A jaina or Buddhist temple,
convent, monastery.

{@--9@} Great expansion of
the organs of speech.

{@--11@} The palace or 
banner of Indra.
